name: CORE BLIMEY
description:
Created by Sam Claydon

Welcome to CORE BLIMEY!

A game where you play as a Planet's Core thief!

Play in a combo of exciting 2D Platforming and Space shooter combat!

Created for the 'Mind the Gap' Jam at Falmouth University. (Sadly ran out of time)

But I might continue this project in the future....

PC Controls:

WASD - move

E - Interact and Jump

Q - Run

Mobile Friendly!
